body.name: Minimalist 2% Salicylic Acid Face Cleanser for Oily, Acne Prone Skin | Anti Acne Face Wash With LHA & Zinc | Sulphate free Gentle BHA Liquid Exfoliant | For Women & Men | 3.4 Fl Oz / 100 ml
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 21 hrs 4 mins
features: [ MULTI-LEVEL CLEANSING ]: Formulated with Capryloyl Salicylic Acid (LHA), which stays on outer layer of skin and provides gentle exfoliation, revealing soft skin, while Salicylic Acid penetrates deep into pores and sebum reduction and oil production. This Salicylic acid and LHA combination provides multi-level cleansing unlike other Salicylic Acid face wash.

[ SULPHATE-FREE, NON DRYING ]: Compared to traditional face wash this is formulated with very mild sulfate-free surfactants (cleansers) that provide optimum cleaning along with several hydrating & soothing ingredients like Panthenol (Vitamin B5) for hydrating overall after-feel.

[ ANTI ACNE ]: Boosted with anti-bacterial Zinc and Salicylic Acid that effectively controls oil production and acts as a potent anti acne (or pimple) active. Acne Reduction and prevents future breakout for clear looking skin.

[ CLEAN & TRANSPARENT BEAUTY ]: This face wash is (i) Fragrance-free (ii) Silicones-free (iii) Sulfates-free (iv) Parabens-free (v) Essential Oils-free and (vi) Dyes-free (vii) Mild Cleanser. Also, it is non-comedogenic, anti-bacterial, and hypoallergenic. Formulated at pH 4.5 - 5.5 with high purity grade Salicylic Acid by Merck, Germany a leading global supplier.

[ FOR COMBINATION TO OILY SKIN TYPE ]: Unlike traditional facewashs, BHA exfoliant are best for combination to oily skin types specially acne prone or sensitive skin. Also, LHA offers a gentle, cell-by-cell exfoliation without any irritation. Formulated for both Men and Women.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This stuff is Amazing!
reviews.reviewText: This works so well for my skin which I was very surprised, I have extremely sensitive skin. 10/10 would recommend this product to anyone! I’m excited to try the other products minimalist has available!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s soft on the skin, the smell is fresh and it makes you feel rejuvenated

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this cleanser!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this cleanser after I was given one by a friend, and let me tell you… I have been very impressed by how well it works for my skin. I have combination oily/dry skin and this cleanser works great without drying me out or leaving me too oily. This cleanser is gentle and leaves my skin feeling clean without that chemical burn some face washes tend to leave. For less than $10, the price is great as well. Will definitely be keeping this as part of my nightly skin routine and I’m looking forward to trying the other products from this brand as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like this product don’t get me wrong but I was hoping it would help out with the oiliness throughout the day and it’s only for a few hours . By 5 I’m needing to use it again or use facial toner . Doesn’t overdry my face though and actually makes it feel soft but very clean .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle, effective for sensitive combo skin
reviews.reviewText: I use this product as my first cleanse. It cleanses and gently exfoliates without making my skin feel stripped. It helps keep breakouts away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sensitive fragrance free
reviews.reviewText: Cleans well, not drying ,excellent value and formula . Removes makeup and if you wash your face sponge with it … wow it’s like a new sponge ! Seller ships fast

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well while not being overly drying like some other salicylic acid cleansers
reviews.reviewText: I like this and will keep using it, for the price point you really can't complain. The bottle is a bit smaller then I expected (photo shows it compared to a roll of toilet paper) but a little goes a long way. The consistency is more watery then it is a cream or gel, which is fine by me but may not be for some so thats something to keep in mind if you have a preference. I haven't noticed a huge difference in the look of my skin but I was using other 2% salicylic cleansers before this one so it's all about the same except for feeling less dried out and that yucky tight feeling post shower, which is a huge plus. I'd recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've been on the hunt for something that is kind to my skin but strong on blemishes and anything else. This right here. This is it. I've tried everything but this is very light, smells great, lathers wonderfully and works great too. I've seen a difference since purchasing this. This will be my go to facial cleanser from now on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Ive been using it for a week so far and i haven't seen any results but i wont judge to quickly. It does make my skin feel soft but so far i havent been results.

reviews.reviewTitle: "Clear Skin in a Bottle: Minimalist 2% Salicylic Acid Face Wash Review"
reviews.reviewText: As someone with oily and acne-prone skin, finding the right face wash has been a journey, and the Minimalist 2% Salicylic Acid Face Wash has proven to be a game-changer. This 100ml bottle of liquid magic has transformed my daily skincare routine and left my skin clearer and more radiant than ever.Effectiveness (5/5): The 2% salicylic acid concentration in this face wash is a key player in combatting acne and pimples. Since incorporating it into my routine, I've experienced a significant reduction in breakouts. It efficiently unclogs pores, removes excess oil, and leaves my skin feeling thoroughly cleansed.Gentle Cleansing (4.5/5): Despite its powerful acne-fighting properties, the face wash is surprisingly gentle. It doesn't strip my skin of its natural moisture, and I appreciate that it's sulfate-free, making it suitable for daily use without causing dryness or irritation.Additional Ingredients (5/5): The inclusion of LHA (Lipo Hydroxy Acid) and Zinc adds to the effectiveness of this face wash. LHA provides exfoliation benefits, promoting skin renewal, while Zinc helps regulate oil production. Together, these ingredients create a well-rounded formula that addresses multiple concerns associated with oily and acne-prone skin.Packaging (5/5): The 100ml size is perfect for daily use and travel. The flip-top cap ensures easy dispensing, and the sleek design of the bottle adds a touch of sophistication to my skincare shelf. It's practical and aesthetically pleasing.Suitability for Men and Women (5/5): This face wash is a unisex gem. Its neutral scent and effective formula make it suitable for both men and women, eliminating the need for multiple products in a shared household.Texture and Consistency (5/5): The gel-like consistency of the face wash feels refreshing on the skin. It lathers well and spreads easily, providing a satisfying cleansing experience without any greasy or sticky residue.Fragrance (4.5/5): The face wash has a subtle, pleasant scent that is not overpowering. It fades quickly after use, making it suitable for those who prefer skincare products with minimal fragrance.Value for Money (5/5): The Minimalist 2% Salicylic Acid Face Wash offers excellent value for money. A small amount goes a long way, and the results in terms of clearer and healthier skin make it a worthwhile investment for anyone struggling with acne or excess oil.

reviews.reviewTitle: Detailed Product Review | After ~2 Months of Usage
reviews.reviewText: The Minimalist 2% Salicylic Acid Face Wash is a great option for people with oily skin. The salicylic acid in the face wash helps to unclog pores and remove excess oil, leaving the skin feeling clean and refreshed. The face wash also contains glycerin which helps to moisturize the skin and prevent it from becoming dry or irritated.One of the standout features of this face wash is its gentle formula, which makes it suitable for people with sensitive skin as well. The face wash is free from harsh chemicals like sulfates, parabens, and silicones, which can cause irritation and dryness.Compared to other face washes in the market, the Minimalist 2% Salicylic Acid Face Wash is priced competitively. It offers similar benefits to higher-end products but at a more affordable price point.Overall, if you're looking for an effective face wash for oily skin that won't break the bank, the Minimalist 2% Salicylic Acid Face Wash is definitely worth considering. Its gentle formula and competitive pricing make it a great option for anyone looking to improve their skincare routine.
Been using it for 2 months now and my acne is in control. The scent is good too.

It does clean ypur face. But as of salicylic use, I didn't feel much difference in my acne and blackheads for a long time. Only After finishing one bottle, i feel my blackheads disappear. On the other hand there are other products which works effectively sooner.
